channel.title: [Advice] Complete God zerker set![Advice]
channel.description:
:) :) :) Ok i finally made it..:D Some peeps on my server kept bugging me about it i gave in and made it so tell em what i can do better... :) :) :) Please no flamming.... i really hate flamers...
Ok this is the complete zerker shield set tell me if u like em!!!
[b][size=18]Bandos:[/size][/b]
[img]http://i697.photobucket.com/albums/vv332/Buddy_budster/Bandosxerk.png[/img]
[b][size=18]Aramdyl:[/size][/b] (This doesnt have a top like rest of them because it doesnt looka t good with it)
[img]http://i697.photobucket.com/albums/vv332/Buddy_budster/armaxerker.png[/img]
[b][size=18]Zamorak:[/size][/b] [img]http://i697.photobucket.com/albums/vv332/Buddy_budster/zamzerker.png[/img]
[b][size=18]Saradomin:[/size][/b]
[img]http://i697.photobucket.com/albums/vv332/Buddy_budster/saradominsheild.png[/img]
Thanks, Buddy

item.title: [Advice] Complete God zerker set![Advice]
item.dc:creator: @Buddy_budster Buddy_budster
item.description:
@Buddy_budster wrote:

[quote=“Surfr, post:7, topic:267329”]I agree with whoever, bandos shouldn’t ever be green.
Also, the whole design looks “imature” it looks like a 13 year old made it, if your 13 your on track! (I’m not being mean, I’m trying to give constructive critisim so take it that way) It looks tacky, and not very well made, you can see lots of primatives in their basic shape. Change it up, edit it some more and maybe more people will like.[/quote]

ok first of all im 14 only one year off of your 13… OK ill try editing it some more… OH AND IT HAS NO PRIATIVES>>>>>> NONE WHAT SO EVER

[quote=“SilentCJ, post:9, topic:267329”]Dude, none of them are the correct colours.

Also, try making them from scratch with a unique shape.
Like mine.

That was completely all from scratch, bent it with bend tool.[/quote]

First of all only the base was the zerker shield… from rsmv The model was only supposed to be a quick one i could do in an hour… This was more of practice then anything… i didnt want all of them to be correct colours arma looked gay… and zamarak clourfag like saradmon colours were too flashy… and bandos colours where just dull… and no im not making a guthix all though ill take ur advice if people like this and do it from scratch.

Read full topic

item.description:
@kingfish999 wrote:

[quote=“SilentCJ, post:9, topic:267329”]Dude, none of them are the correct colours.

Also, try making them from scratch with a unique shape.
Like mine.

That was completely all from scratch, bent it with bend tool.[/quote]
lol nice m8

item.title: [Advice] Complete God zerker set![Advice]
item.dc:creator: @Surfr Surfr
item.description:
@Surfr wrote:

I agree with whoever, bandos shouldn’t ever be green.

Also, the whole design looks “imature” it looks like a 13 year old made it, if your 13 your on track! (I’m not being mean, I’m trying to give constructive critisim so take it that way) It looks tacky, and not very well made, you can see lots of primatives in their basic shape. Change it up, edit it some more and maybe more people will like.
